reviews.review: If you have a low end PC and play CS:GO this may be a good alternative as it can be played on pretty shit specs at high settings/frames so it is actually playable. Besides that the community servers are a lot like CS:GO servers.
my official statement is that this game is of high quality

I have experienced glitches/bugs and I still love it. I would still try fixing the game.

An amazing masterpiece in the shooter genre. It's not too modern, but it provides lots of modifiable content, mounts for Garry's Mod, and is a good alternative to the resource-heavy CS:GO. The toxic community has also moved to the newest game in the franchise. Fun game.
best online fps game. Based on skill .
